NAME: farmer bobs disturbance
DESC: Farmer bob is having a goblin problem in his crops, and has asked you to take care of it for him. Venture west to the fields of grass and slay all of the goblins there! Return to Farmer Bob once this task is completed for a nice reward.

NAME: Jimmy's Mitton
DESC: Jimmy can't find his precious cat Mittons. Help him find Mittons!

NAME: The Glowing Lotus
DESC: Peach wants you to help her find a glowling lotus from deep in the Shady Woods.
